description.2: In Japan, when train delay happened, the train company will announce the delay on their website and station. However, the announcement is mostly in Japanese, and the information is not centralized. Which means, it difficult to look at the information for each train line. Therefore, this application is created to provide a centralized platform for train delay information. Utilizing web application, and social media platform such as Twitter and LINE, to provide train delay information in English and Japanese.
